description: User comments /pivot to remove completed work - should create reversion sub-issue

issue.title: Implement authentication system
issue.body:
Add OAuth2 authentication.

## Requirements

- OAuth2 support
- Session management

## Todos

- [x] Add OAuth2 library
- [x] Create auth endpoints
- [ ] Add rate limiting to auth

pivotDescription: Actually, we don't want OAuth2 anymore. Remove all OAuth2 implementation.
